org.springframework.data.repository.core.support

类 ReactiveRepositoryInformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.repository.core.support.ReactiveRepositoryInformation
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    RepositoryInformation, RepositoryMetadata
    已过时。 
    as of 2.0, can be deleted...

    @Deprecated
public class ReactiveRepositoryInformation
extends Object
    This RepositoryInformation uses a ConversionService to check whether method arguments can be converted for invocation of implementation methods.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ReactiveRepositoryInformation(RepositoryMetadata metadata, Class<?> repositoryBaseClass, RepositoryComposition composition)
      已过时。 
      Creates a new ReactiveRepositoryInformation for the given RepositoryMetadata, repository base class, custom implementation and ConversionService.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 已过时的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Set<Class<?>> getAlternativeDomainTypes()
      Returns the set of types the repository shall be discoverable for when trying to look up a repository by domain type.
      CrudMethods getCrudMethods()
      Returns CrudMethods meta information for the repository.
      Class<?> getDomainType()
      Returns the domain class the repository is declared for.
      Class<?> getIdType()
      Returns the id class the given class is declared for.
      Streamable<Method> getQueryMethods()
      Returns all methods considered to be query methods.
      Class<?> getRepositoryBaseClass()
      Returns the base class to be used to create the proxy backing instance.
      Class<?> getRepositoryInterface()
      Returns the repository interface.
      Class<?> getReturnedDomainClass(Method method)
      Returns the domain class returned by the given Method.
      Method getTargetClassMethod(Method method)
      Returns the target class method that is backing the given method.
      boolean hasCustomMethod()
      Returns if the configured repository interface has custom methods, that might have to be delegated to a custom implementation.
      boolean isBaseClassMethod(Method method)
      Returns whether the given method is logically a base class method.
      boolean isCustomMethod(Method method)
      Returns whether the given method is a custom repository method.
      boolean isPagingRepository()
      Returns whether the repository is a paging one.
      boolean isQueryMethod(Method method)
      Returns whether the given method is a query method.
      boolean isReactiveRepository()
      Returns whether the repository is a reactive one, i.e. if it uses reactive types in one of its methods.

      • ReactiveRepositoryInformation

        public ReactiveRepositoryInformation(RepositoryMetadata metadata,
                                     Class<?> repositoryBaseClass,
                                     RepositoryComposition composition)
        已过时。 
        Creates a new ReactiveRepositoryInformation for the given RepositoryMetadata, repository base class, custom implementation and ConversionService.
        参数:
        metadata - must not be null.
        repositoryBaseClass - must not be null.
        composition - can be null.

      • getTargetClassMethod

        public Method getTargetClassMethod(Method method)
        从接口复制的说明: RepositoryInformation
        Returns the target class method that is backing the given method. This can be necessary if a repository interface redeclares a method of the core repository interface (e.g. for transaction behavior customization). Returns the method itself if the target class does not implement the given method. Implementations need to make sure the Method returned can be invoked via reflection, i.e. needs to be accessible.
        指定者:
        getTargetClassMethod 在接口中 RepositoryInformation
        参数:
        method - must not be null.
        返回:

      • getQueryMethods

        从接口复制的说明: RepositoryInformation

      • isBaseClassMethod

        public boolean isBaseClassMethod(Method method)
        从接口复制的说明: RepositoryInformation
        Returns whether the given method is logically a base class method. This also includes methods (re)declared in the repository interface that match the signatures of the base implementation.
        指定者:
        isBaseClassMethod 在接口中 RepositoryInformation
        参数:
        method - must not be null.
        返回:

      • hasCustomMethod

        public boolean hasCustomMethod()
        从接口复制的说明: RepositoryInformation
        Returns if the configured repository interface has custom methods, that might have to be delegated to a custom implementation. This is used to verify repository configuration.
        指定者:
        hasCustomMethod 在接口中 RepositoryInformation
        返回:

        public Set<Class<?>> getAlternativeDomainTypes()
        从接口复制的说明: RepositoryMetadata

        指定者:
        getAlternativeDomainTypes 在接口中 RepositoryMetadata
